BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application No. 20155378 SCK pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York City School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new, approximately 676-seat Public School Facility, located at 256 59th Street (Block 861, Lots 23, 29, 37, and 43), in the Borough of Brooklyn, Community School District No. 20, Community Board 7, Council District 38.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Public School Facility,  256 59th St, Brooklyn (20155378 SCK)

Items.Title: Application No. 20155378 SCK pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York City School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new, approximately 676-seat Public School Facility, located at 256 59th Street (Block 861, Lots 23, 29, 37, and 43), in the Borough of Brooklyn, Community School District No. 20, Community Board 7, Council District 38.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Subcommittee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be P-C Item Approved by Subcommittee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Public School Facility,  256 59th St, Brooklyn (20155378 SCK)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Menchaca and Greenfield
